dcag.tasks.LOCALIZATION_QUALITY.q1: The language on this screen is clear and easily understood.
dcag.tasks.LOCALIZATION_QUALITY.q2: The language on this screen is as simple and respectful as we expect from Uber.
dcag.tasks.LOCALIZATION_QUALITY.q3: The language on this screen is similar to what I speak - it doesn't sound awkward or mechanical.
dcag.tasks.LOCALIZATION_QUALITY.q4: The icons and designs on this screen match my culture.
dcag.tasks.IMAGE_LABELLING.q1: Is the food item clearly visible in the photo?
dcag.tasks.IMAGE_LABELLING.q2: Does the photo have alcohol or tobacco?
dcag.tasks.IMAGE_LABELLING.q3: Does the photo have a watermark?
dcag.tasks.IMAGE_LABELLING.q4: Is there more than 1 dish in the photo?
dcag.tasks.IMAGE_LABELLING.q5: Are there any humans in the photo?

dcag.pages.reportAnIssue.title: Report an issue
dcag.pages.reportAnIssue.paragraph1: We're always looking for ways to improve the app. If you've identified an issue, please report it by adding the details below.
dcag.pages.reportAnIssue.paragraph2: After receiving your report, our team will look into the concern. Please note our support team won't be able to provide status updates on reported issues.
